column1: 1,基于大脑灰质与白质网络融合的阿尔茨海默病诊断方法研究(Research on diagnosis of Alzheimer's disease based on the fusion of brain's gray and white matters networks),国家自然科学基金-青年项目 (National Natural Science Foundation of China-Young Scientist Fund),2022.01-2024.12,Project Investigator

2,眼脑信息关联性研究及其在阿尔茨海默病早期诊断中的应用(Research on the relationship between the eye and brain and its application in early diagnosis of Alzheimer's disease),中国博士后科学基金面上资助 (China Postdoctoral Science Foundation),2021.06-2022.07, Project Investigator
